javadoc:
Executes a single job at a time in priority order.
@see Worker

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment:
Creates a PriorityWorker that will use a shared thread pool to process jobs.  
 Also, threads created using this constructor are not persistent.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the shared thread pool.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the monitor used to cancel jobs.

methods.name: <init>
methods.comment: This constructor allows you to change persistence and shared thread pool usage.

params.name: name
params.comment: the name of the shared thread pool.

params.name: isPersistentThread
useSharedThreadPool
params.comment:
true signals to use the given name to find/create a thread pool 
             that can be shared throughout the system.

params.name: monitor
params.comment: the monitor used to cancel jobs.

name: PriorityWorker
comment: Executes a single job at a time in priority order.
